none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 06, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
Raw guttural crust/grind from Chiba prefecture. There is a rudimentary appeal to this demo, even though I kinda passed it over at first listen. Primitive as all hell, it's possible they were going for a death metal sound and just couldn't quite pull it off, but I'll never really know. Four tracks of speed picking (and dive bombing) guitar, throaty grind vocals and the most earnest blast beat you will hear all day. It says "Studio Rehearsal" right on the cover, so you've been warned. STUDIO REHEARSAL 1991
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-lY9yxukl41E/Unm8aXHXLRI/AAAAAAAAI8E/ioYwINy1RJw/s1600/unbiased+cover+copy.jpg

seo.title: Unbiased - Studio Rehearsal demo 1991 - Terminal Escape
